content_profile.title: Special: DAOing a Twitter Board Seat | Where It Happens

key_takeaways: Solution: Use founder-focused banking like Mercury (Difficulty: beginner)
Strategy: Focus on direct response advertising over brand advertising
Strategy: Focused leadership - one CEO per major company
Startup Opportunity: Twitter DAO for board governance (Target: Twitter users and crypto/web3 community)
